website_summaries.verdict: A portable and energy-efficient model that's perfect for minor power outages and outdoor leisure activities like camping.
pros: Compact design makes it highly portable
Doesn't take a lot of fuel to operate
Having 1000 watts makes it ideal for powering small appliances
cons: Not a good choice if you expect to have heavy-duty power needs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine. Starts reliably runs quietly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine. Starts reliably runs quietly. My only suggestion for improvement, is that they put a metal sleeve around the handle, which is sold separately, to prevent people cutting through the plastic handle if you have a chain down in stealing the unit. The unit is so attractive, and expensive, it is very attractive to thieves.
customer_reviews.author: James McMaster

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal. Be careful when filling with oil. If you follow the instructions literally you will over fill. I did and it wouldn't crank. By the time I figured out the problem and filled properly it wouldn't crank cause oil was all up in the head. Googled the problem, followed posted instructions, finally got it to crank. Once cranked it runs good. Used it all last football season for tailgating and it ran perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tonto

customer_reviews.title: You’ll go through a lot of gas
customer_reviews.text: The unit is so quiet that a mere conversation between two people makes you forget it’s running at all. It holds a good amount of gas and while it seems to last forever on one fill-up, you’ll need to continually fill it up because you forget it’s even running!
customer_reviews.author: Andersons

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Great little generator, super quiet, the size of a small suitcase. This is my second one, the first survived a lot of extreme use in dusty deserts. I had it tuned up a couple time but the corrosion was the end of it but a very satisfied 12 years of use and the price has barely risen. I also own a 2000i for bigger jobs. Don't get the cheapest generator at Harbor Freight. It won't last and it will be so noisy anyone near you will hate you when you turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hinkamp

customer_reviews.title: The Gold Standard....and the QUIETEST gen you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: For my travel trailer, this is perfect. Why? 1) weighs just 30#. Those 2000-2200 Hondas weigh over 50#! Too much for my back. 2) Quietest gen on the market. Even under load. Makes for happy neighbors, rangers, and camp hosts. 3) Can operate everything in my trailer that the 2000/2200 can- except the microwave and that's fine with me. 4) Well made and reliable. Large nationwide network of service centers if needed...NOT an oddball orphan. The well-known Gold Standard of small generators. 'Nuff said! Yes...it costs a LOT more. But you know that. Just wish this had a fuel shut-off to allow burning out of the fuel...instead, you have to drain it.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: with an easy start, and protective vapor lock to secure fuel ...
customer_reviews.text: This generator is definitely quiet. Most people don't' hear it going by our RV until they are beside our unit. At 29lbs, with an easy start, and protective vapor lock to secure fuel vapor when not operating what not to like. Ive also use the Honda for night ligting, running power equipment and providing a jump for a dead battery. Very good value and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn's Faves

customer_reviews.title: Bad engine, I am returning! Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I really was excited to finally splurge and get a Honda..I am returning it since engine does not run well and does not hold the advertised load, or even a 4 amps chest freezer.. what a bummer! Seems a lot of issues on these smaller units.
customer_reviews.author: VinceT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small generator.
customer_reviews.text: Relatively light and well designed. One pull start every time. Minimal vibration. Extremely quiet which Honda is well known for. My only issue and the reason for only 4 starrs is that I feel the price is a bit too high for the wattage. But then again I'm a bit of a cheap . . . . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: High quality prouduct with excellent durability.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, but pricey. Especially compared to the EU2000i model for about $200 more. However this one does the job that I purchased it for and is very portable at 36 pounds with full fuel & Oil.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: No noise
customer_reviews.text: It's a Honda inverter generator and we all know their reputation and performance. My review is for the vendor HondaSouth out of Georgia, they get 5 stars even though usps took long to deliver because of hurricane Maria in Puerto Rico. Have been running a 2000 watt version of this puppy for 45 days straight, it gets to take a break now, get the magnetic oil dipstick too, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Herb in PR

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because Honda usually has good products. Have some older larger Honda generators that still work. Bought this one in June used no more than a dozen times maybe 4-5 hrs each time. Went to use it and it won't start. So in 4 months it's broke.
customer_reviews.author: D R

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Honda generators are simply the best. Yes they're expensive...but they're worth it. Easy to use and will run forever.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived like new but there are some oil leak and gas ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived like new but there are some oil leak and gas smell in the gas tank. Apparently this is a used. Someone returned it and it was sold as new! I have to pay the return fee. Buyer aware. I suspect this one will be sold as new again because it does look like new. But the oil leak and the gas smell is the proof of used! Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Description on homepage.
customer_reviews.text: The image and description said it was a 120v 8.3amp the product code was EZGA-1252158, I received a 120v 7.5amp product code EAAT-3024669. I paid more to get the 8.3 amp item in the description. I could have got the same item for $100.00 less from another supplier. This not right.. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat a Honda! This is my third one ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat a Honda! This is my third one I have purchased (one still in use, one stolen). Does the job fast and well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, quiet generator
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight, low noise generator. Quality built. Make sure u have a short funnel to add oil.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Allows a longer and more enjoyable camping & boating experience!
customer_reviews.text: Making our weekend boating trips a lot better experience. Easy to use and is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G.

customer_reviews.title: I've had a variety of generators but you just can't ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had a variety of generators but you just can't beat the Honda. It's so quiet I had to double check that it was actually running. Don't be fooled by the cheaper "Honda Like" units.
customer_reviews.author: madflyer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my needs, seems a little tinnier ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my needs, seems a little tinnier and a bit louder than the Honda 2000 watt generator I use regardless of the power level (No load is plenty tinny and loud).
customer_reviews.author: A. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, and worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they are as good as they say. Just remember to open the vent cap on the gas tank cover, or it will stall quickly. Had me stumped for a bit. These are so quiet, they are almost dangerous, as you can stand next to it, and not realize you are breathing in the fumes from a running engine!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Honda is the best. Made even better when you can get them on sale here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Typical honda qgality
customer_reviews.text: Life saver for several reasons. Extremeky quiet and economical to run
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed, frustrated!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this generator. I've had nothing but trouble with it and the Honda Corporation wants to blame it all on gasoline! I think I bought a lemon. It's in the shop now due to an oil leak! I've only got 60 hours on it. It's a 2016 model.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma	Henriques

customer_reviews.title: You'll really love this Generator plus it'squite!
customer_reviews.text: Great Generator I highly recommend this for going camping and Motocrossing if you ride dirt bikes!It's ultra quite and very easy to maintain.It won't make other campers upset and mad.I wish Suzuki still made generators,also sold under the Toro name heck ask me I'll tell you about them!Since I use to race Suzuki MX Bikes But for now buy this generator.You'll love it!Bye-bye for now and take care.This seller is great and I purchased it new at a great low price!
customer_reviews.author: Motoxboy05

customer_reviews.title: At this time it is not working. It starts ...
customer_reviews.text: At this time it is not working. It starts right up, however, it stalls out in 30 seconds or so. We are dealing with Honda by phone and planning to take it to a Honda Warranty Shop today.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Quiet Peace of Mind.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things you pay a little extra for. Honda makes reliable equipment you can not worry about. I stored my eu1000 in a closet for years without touching it, and yesterday pulled it out, put oil and gas in it, and it started and ran the very first try. Impressively it powered a full-size fridge when my power went out (struggling a bit with the spike of turning it on), and kept my lights, chargers, and computers up and going until my power came back on. I'm very happy and grateful for Honda making a quality product you can depend on in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A. Corwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dependable Portable Generator at a Great Cost
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd portable generator. The first one worked great and served its purpose but it was so noisy I got rid of it. The second one was quieter but still hurt my ears. The third one I purchased was the Honda 1000i and what a difference. Quiet... so quiet I could carry on a normal conversation with it running beside me. And, it is so much more economical with the ECO which the others did not have and it will run for hours on a half gallon of gas. You want quality and reliability... buy the Honda generator."
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M Berke

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little generator
customer_reviews.text: I generally use it to power my Stihl weed eater when out of reach of house power. It's so quiet that the electric weed eater overpowers the generator sound. I run it on eco mode and it saves a lot of fuel without compromising power output. Next purchase will be a Honda EU2200 to support my Airstream when off grid. Honda makes excellent products..from lawn mowers to Jet Airplanes
customer_reviews.author: Robin Green

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Little Guy
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7000 watt and this 1000 watt. It’s a Honda and the name speaks for itself. Light weight, easy to start and sometimes it’s easier to fire it up then to try to find a bunch of extension cords. Also works great to charge car batteries. If you are looking for something that’s going to last, Honda has you covered.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Baney

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: Poor designed engine will wear out very quickly. Too expensive for what you get need to be redesigned. Not everything Honda builds walks on water.
customer_reviews.author: H8snow

customer_reviews.title: Pull, pull, pull, pull....
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, after you spend 15 minutes trying to get it to start. Choke settings, etc, don't make any difference. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Standbayou

customer_reviews.title: these generators are great i have a 1000 2000 and 3000 but i ...
customer_reviews.text: these generators are great i have a 1000 2000 and 3000 but i dont know why the are so god awful high on here. i paid less for my 925.99 for my 2000 and 699.99 for my 1000. you can get any 1000 from 7 to 8 hundred buck at any outdoor power equipment store like a john deer (quality equipment). or a southern states store. whoever is selling this own here his trying to screw people over. if you purchase this buy some Vaseline because you geting bent of the counter on this one
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Honda EU1000i Inverter Generator, Super Quiet, Eco-Throttle, 1000 Watts/8.3 Amps @ 120v (Red)
product_meta.description: Whether you're looking for some luxury or just looking to power the essentials, the Honda 1,000-Watt Inverter Generator will get the job done quietly. Power your essential small appliances with this outdoor generator. Appliances like a coffee maker, RV fridge, and lights can all be powered. When powering appliances, it's important to take into account the starting wattage as well as the running wattage as the generator won't be able to support more than 1,000. More sensitive electronics like smartphones and laptops can also be used thanks to the stable power output. The inverter within the generator helps to produce the same amount of power without the annoying noise. Because the inverter generator is more efficient with fuel, the fuel tank itself is smaller and lighter. Stay powered with this quiet inverter generator. The 1,000-Watt Inverter Generator by Honda is a perfect companion for those who need power on their outdoor trips.
feature_bullets: Lightweight and compact: weighing only 29 lbs., the EU1000i is incredibly lightweight and portable, it's easy to get it to your destination

So quiet, your neighbors will thank you, the EU1000i operates at 53 to 59 dBA, which is less noise than a normal conversation, this makes it ideal for camping, supplemental RV power and any other activity that requires quiet operation

Honda's inverter technology means stable, clean power in a smaller, lighter package, the precision of Honda's inverter technology ensures our inverter generators produce power that is as reliable as the power you get from your outlets at home
Protected by oil alert: this protects the generator by shutting the engine off when low oil pressure is detected
Thanks to our exclusive eco-throttle system, the EU1000i offers fuel efficiency, it runs up to 8.3 hours on a single tank, depending on the load.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars62 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
